definitions: To sew or mend with stitches.
To make, mend, or repair something with stitches.
To join or close with stitches.
To experience a sharp, sudden pain in the side of the body, often during exercise.
examples: She stitches a quilt every winter.
The doctor stitches the wound carefully.
He stitches up the tear in his shirt.
He always stitches when he runs too fast.
